property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Light creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever your creatures would leave, you may put 2 of your tamaseeds on the bottom of your deck in any order instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this tamaseed is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, tap all your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this tamaseed is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, draw a card, then your opponent chooses one of their untapped creatures and taps it.

property.value: No Rarity

property.value: DMSD-20 King Master Start Deck: Joe's Star Max Evolution

property.name: Type
property.value: Star Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature costs 2 less to summon if you evolve from a tamaseed. {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or light creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of the following: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures or tamaseeds that cost 4 or less. Your opponent's shieldifies that card: ► You may shieldify the top card of your deck.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-20 King Master Start Deck: Joe's Star Max Evolution

property.name: Type
property.value: Star Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Metallica/Angel Command Dragon/RexStars

property.name: Rules
Set
property.value: DMSD-20 King Master Start Deck: Joe's Star Max Evolution

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, choose one of the following: ► Draw a card: ► Put a light evolution creature that costs 7 or less from your hand. That creature gets "blocker" until the start of your next turn. (You may tap a creature that has "blocker" to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to that creature.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-20 King Master Start Deck: Joe's Star Max Evolution

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this tamaseed is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it into it's owner's mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-20 King Master Start Deck: Joe's Star Max Evolution

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ This creature is put tapped. ■ If you have a tamaseed, this creature gets +4000 power and "double breaker". (A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.) ■ Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, they must attack this creature if able.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-20 King Master Start Deck: Joe's Star Max Evolution

property.name: Type
property.value: Star Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Metallica/Rainbow Phantom/RexStars

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or light creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Each of your evolution creatures cost 1 less to summon and your tamaseeds cost 1 less to use. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-20 King Master Start Deck: Joe's Star Max Evolution

property.name: Race
property.value: Light Bringer

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, if you have 2 shields or less, you may shieldify the top card of your deck.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-20 King Master Start Deck: Joe's Star Max Evolution

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may take an evolution creature and a tamaseed from among them, and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may take an evolution creature from among them, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
